=== Summary ===

The goal is to provide burning facility over LTSP using libburn and iscsi.

=== Rationale ===

Providing burning facility on thin clients means that we'll have doors open for number of interesting features.

=== Use cases ===

Donkey wants to save the work he did at school. He quickly takes out cd-r and burns it using.

=== Scope ===

Scope for feisty is to implement basic facility, while leaving ISO preparation work to the user.
